subject: [PATCH] mm: bail out when the PMD has been set in bloom filter

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: Raised several questions about the patch's intent, behavior, and user-facing effects, seeking clarification on its impact on MGLRU heuristics.

2026-03-01.patch_summary: The patch aims to improve the MGLRU heuristics by preventing young pages from being accumulated in PMDs.
